notes: Unlike regular heal amplification, Greater Healing amplifies outgoing healing, not incoming healing. This means any healing provided by the owner gets ampified, regardless of who the target is. Vice versa, other sources of healing applied to the owner are not amplified.

Health regen amplification, lifesteal amplification, and spell lifesteal amplification are provided by the item separately, and not by this ability.
